Plot length frequency histogram with High Density Interval

plot_species_hdi.Rd

This function takes a data frame and standardises its column names by converting them to lower case, replacing special characters with underscores, and ensuring that names are syntactically valid R names.

Usage

plot_species_hdi(species_data, max_lengths, dir)

Arguments

species_data

A data frame with length information for one species

max_lengths

A data frame with lmaximum length information

dir

Directory where plots will be saved

Value

Saves plots into directory
